item.description: The Inn features six private dining rooms and a banquet hall capable of accomodating up to 250 people comfortably. The professional staff is dedicated to your complete satisfaction. People come from miles around to enjoy the wide variety of entrees including prime rib, one of our most popular dishes. Breakfast Buffet on Sunday is only $10.95 ($13.47 per person-includes tax and gratuity). All you can eat Breakfast! Some of the items are: Coffee, Bloody Mary Punch, Bacon, Scrambled Eggs, Home Fries, French Toast, Fruit Platter, Vegetable Juices, Danish, Rice Pilaf, Rolls & Butter, Tossed Salad, Carved Roast Beef and Carved Ham, Stir Fry, plenty of desserts and much more! We will have our own private dining room! p.s. Daylight Savings Time begins today! http://www.spencercou.... Check out this link! It'll be fun! Please reply with a definite YES or NO so that I can contact the restaurant and give them an actual count. Thanks!
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the Hostess for the Meetup Group
item.name: Sunday Brunch at Spencer Country Inn!
